summary: The diff implements all three requirements: REQ-1 (sex display format), REQ-2 (app rename to SurgiPaw), and REQ-3 (dashboard with open tasks). All acceptance criteria appear to be met with appropriate backend schema changes, frontend display logic, navigation integration, and real-time updates via React Query.

hallucinated_features.description: Backend schema change from enum values (male, neutered, female, spayed) to (male, maleNeutered, female, femaleSpayed)
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest explicitly constrains: 'Maintain the existing sex value options (male, neutered, female, spayed) in the backend schema'. The diff shows backend/main.mo changed the Sex type to use #maleNeutered and #femaleSpayed instead of the required #neutered and #spayed values.
